1. Line #7
addi $s0, $zero, -15

type: I-type
opcode: 001000, 8
rs: 00000, 0
rt: 10000, 16
immedate: -15, 1111 1111 1111 0001

binary: 0010 0000 0001 0000 1111 1111 1111 0001
hex: 0x2010fff1



2. Line #14
slt $t0, $s0, $s1

type: R-type
opcode: 000000, 0
rs: 10000, 16
rt: 10001, 17
rd: 01000, 8
shamt: 00000, 0
funct: 101010, 42

binary: 0000 0010 0001 0001 0100 0000 0010 1010
hex: 0x0211402a



3. Line #17
beq $t0, $zero, LEEQ

type: I-type
opcode: 000100, 4
rs: 01000, 8
rt: 00000, 0
immediate: 6, 0000 0000 0000 0110

binary: 0001 0000 1000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0110
hex: 0x11000006



4. Line #20
j GRT

type: J-type
opcode: 000010, 2
address: GRT 0x0040001c, 
0000 0000 0100 0000 0000 0000 0001 1100
use:  00 0001 0000 0000 0000 0000 0111

binary: 0000 1000 0001 0000 0000 0000 0000 0111
hex: 0x08010007
